Berline.rs

A Berlin-local Rust community

Next

Binding to Rust from everything Wednesday, Aug. 8th, 2018 19:00 @ Mozilla Berlin

It is time for another Rust meetup in Berlin!

This time we have a mini-conference around one topic: bindgen.

The meetup will happen on Wednesday, August 8th, 2018 19:00

We will meet in the beautiful Mozilla Berlin Office for a fresh round of talks, drinks, food and chatter about everyone’s favorite programming language.

We’re looking forward to see you there!

Please let us know if you're planning to drop by! :-)

  1. rust-bindgen

    by Emilio Cobos Álvarez

  2. cbindgen

    by Alexis Beingessner

  3. wasm-bindgen

    by Ashley Williams

Location: Mozilla Berlin Office

Schlesische Straße 27

Berlin

Website

Show on Google Maps

Show on OpenStreetMap

  • Enter the stairway C located at the very back
  • Go up to floor 3
  • Walk through the open door
